name: BGMF 070 - "Night Science"
description:
BOY / GIRL / MOON / FLOWER
by LoveBux Labs

This is a set of 111 AI-Generated Paintings from LoveBux Labs.
Each painting is an exploration of 5 two-word phrases:

Boy Girl
Moon Flower
Happy Sad
Sun Moon
Science Magic

These ten words were placed into all possible 
two-word combinations, and the AI was tasked 
with resolving or grappling with every permutation. 
of the inherent *dualities* loaded into these words. 

The result is a collection 100 unique 1/1 images 
that have a wide variety of forms and tone, but 
stem from single creative impulse / provocation.

I will also adding 11 super-rare custom cards 
incorporating more complex word combinations.

The collection will be closed at 111 paintings 
and then it will live on in secondary as a collection 
to swap, HODL, flip, and hopefully add value 
into the hands of holders in weeks months and years ahead.

Thank you for supporting my work,

HP LoveBux
Advanced Research Dept.
LoveBux Labs
